Question: GE Lighting, a Savant company CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
GE Lighting, a Savant company

Product: Cync Reveal HD+Full Color Undercabinet Fixtures and Pucks

- First and only full color and edge-lit smart undercabinet lights available in the North American market
- Offers exceptional clarity, millions of color options, and smart control
- Slim profile and edge-lit design with diffused pools of vibrant colors and pure, clean light
- Up to 10 fixtures can be connected to one another
- Easily installed with captive screws as a plug-in or hardwired
- Compatible with Cync app, Alexa, Google Assistant, Matter, and Savant professional app
- Over-the-air updates to broaden the dimming range to less than 1% brightness
- Available for purchase later this year starting at $59.99
- Matter-compatible with a total of 20 Cync products available in 2024
- Integration with Savant professional smart home ecosystems and control through the Savant app or voice
Summary_cn:
通用电气照明公司，萨凡特公司旗下品牌

产品：Cync Reveal HD+全彩色橱柜灯具与小球灯

- 北美市场上首款也是唯一一款全彩色和边缘照明的智能橱柜灯具
- 提供卓越的清晰度、数以百万计的色彩选择和智能控制功能
- 薄型设计和边缘照明结构，带来色彩斑斓和纯净明亮的光线
- 最多可将10个灯具互相连接
- 可选择插入式或硬线安装，方便安装，配有固定螺丝
- 兼容Cync应用程序、Alexa、Google助手、Matter和萨凡特专业应用程序
- 可通过空中更新将调光范围扩展到低于1%的亮度
- 今年晚些时候开始销售，价格从59.99美元起
- 2024年将有总共20款Matter兼容的Cync产品
- 可与萨凡特专业智能家居生态系统集成，并通过萨凡特应用程序或语音进行控制
